about_the_game:
Wishes of Dawn

A multiplayer horror game filled with tension and action, where a team of four explores ghosts and other supernatural entities from different civilizations worldwide. Embark on dangerous missions with your team to uncover the mysteries behind these entities and gather evidence. This culturally diverse horror experience takes you on a new adventure with every mission.

Key Features

  • Unique Maps and Environments

    • Explore locations from abandoned mansions to ancient temples, each belonging to different cultures.

    • Every map offers a distinct experience with its theme and clues.

    • Dangers and mysteries await around every corner.

  • Various Equipment
    Use advanced tools to track supernatural entities:

    • EMF Detector: Detect electromagnetic field changes.

    • Ouija Board: Attempt direct communication with entities.

    • Night Vision Cameras and Thermal Sensors: Reveal hidden clues in the dark.

    • Spirit Box and UV Lights: Trace hidden messages and paranormal activity.

  • Dynamic Gameplay

    • Every mission offers a unique experience with random events and shifting entity behaviors.

    • You can never predict how events will unfold, even when replaying the same mission.

  • Dangerous Entities

    • Each entity has unique traits, weaknesses, and attack methods tied to its culture.

    • Learn their behaviors and collaborate strategically to survive.

  • Intensified Horror Elements

    • Dynamic lighting, environmental sound effects, and unexpected events keep the tension high.

    • You’ll need to stay alert at all times.

  • Evidence Collection and Analysis

    • Capture photos, record audio, or observe object movements to gather evidence.

    • Carefully analyze to determine the type and intent of the supernatural entity.

  • Customizable Gameplay

    • Players can personalize their equipment and abilities to suit their style and strategies.

    • Whether you prefer quickly gathering evidence and escaping or focusing on uncovering the entity’s weaknesses, your choices shape the mission's outcome.

  • Understanding Entity Types and Strategy Development

    • Supernatural entities from different cultures exhibit unique behaviors and clues.

    • Study their traits and devise clever plans to overcome them.

    • One wrong move could doom your entire team.

Wishes of Dawn offers an immersive experience that combines fear with strategic teamwork. Are you ready to become a true supernatural investigator?

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400H / AMD Ryzen 5 4500
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3000 series / AMD Radeon RX 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Wishes of Dawn is a horror game where you and your team of four work together to track down ghosts and other supernatural entities. Investigate these beings from different civilizations using items from their cultures and collect evidence to uncover the truth.
